introduction: Part 1: Rocket FeverFrom Sputnik to the Mercury Seven and from JFK to Ham the chimpanzee, meet the key players in the first years of the Space Race.Part 2: Triumph and TragedyA look at the Project Gemini missions that made a moon shot possible.Part 3: Into the VoidRevisit the three high-risk, high-reward missions that made Apollo 11's historic trip to the moon possible.Part 4: One Giant LeapFrom blastoff to the Eagle's landing to Columbia's splashdown in the Pacific, revisit the historic Apollo 11 mission.Part 5: Brink of DisasterNASA combats budget cuts, "triggered lightning," and the near-disaster of Apollo 13.Part 6: New FrontierNASA rebounds from the near-disaster of Apollo 13 with four moon missions that change space travel forever.
